Author: futurecoin_light
Title: [ANN][ICO] FutureCoin Light 🔥
Body: FutureCoin Light  WEBSITE | WHITEPAPER | TELEGRAM  What Is FutureCoin apart from the hottest new coin out there?  FutureCoin Light is a cryptocurrency token (ERC20), placed in Ethereum Network. The FutureCoin network runs without having any central servers. It is easy to use and allows you to benefit from the blockchain technology. That means that money can be sent from “Alice” to “Bob” within seconds, without any fees.  We are also providing our users with investment tools, like trading functionality, lending platform and referral program.  !!!PROJECT PRE-REGISTRATION OPENED!!!  Main Features: Decentralized No middlemen required Secure Self Regulated Limited Fair Smart Contracts Own Payment Network Advertising Network, where FutureCoin is an only payment method  Specification:  Name: FutureCoin Symbol: FTC Total Supply: 32,000,000 ICO: 5,000,000 Decimal place: 18 Standard: ERC20 ICO Date: 5th of March, 2018 Price: Starts from 1EUR TimeZone: London (GMT)  Initial Coin Offering:  Initial coin offering (ICO) of FutureCoin Light are going to be launched on 5 of March 2018. We are going to sell 5,000,000 FutureCoin’s. The ICO will be held until 9th of April, 2018.  Lending Platform:  Lending is the opportunity to get daily return on your FutureCoin investments. It is an impressive concept for those who want to enjoy a daily passive income. No fixed daily interest rate can be guaranteed. The maximum interest rate is 38% per month on your investments. When the contract expires then the investment fund will be returned in accordance with terms & conditions. You can easily invest your FutureCoin’s into our lending platform using the back-office dashboard.  Referral Program:  With FutureCoin Referral Program you can earn additional coins sharing this opportunity with your friends and referring them to the FutureCoin community. FutureCoin referral and affiliate program is designed with 7 lucrative levels to earn additional commissions by every registered partner. You will earn a commission every time a referral lends FutureCoin on our platform through your affiliate link.  Roadmap:  We already have a strict plan about our evolution: 5th of March, 2018 - Initial Coin offering starts 9th of April, 2018 - Initial Coin offering ends 1st of May, 2018 - Lending Platform will be launched 7th of May, 2018 - Trading Platform will be launched 11th of June, 2018 - FutureCoin will be available on global market 3rd of September, 2018 - FutureCoin Payment System will be launched and ready to be integrated globally 8th of October, 2018 - Advertising Network, where FutureCoin is an only payment method, launched 17th of December, 2018 - Closing the year with a global report and public event. Target price 30-35EUR   !!!PROJECT PRE-REGISTRATION OPENED!!!    WEBSITE | WHITEPAPER | TELEGRAM

Author: futurecoin_light
Title: [ANN][ICO] FutureCoin Light 🔥
Body: With FutureCoin there is no need to mine anything. We will define Proof Of Stake (PoS) concept, which states that a person can "mine" or validate block transactions according to how many FutureCoin's he or she holds. This means that the more FutureCoin's owned by a "miner", the more "mining power" he or she has, which results with bigger profit.  Advantages: No electricity cost No noise Great ROI Secured funds Friendly interface

Author: futurecoin_light
Title: [ANN][ICO] FutureCoin Light 🔥
Body: After successful ICO and placing on global markets we will concentrate on inventing our own products, which are currently in development. We currently have two products in our pipeline:  FutureCoin Payment System - will be launched on 3rd of September, 2018 and will be ready for integration globally with any e-commerce project within few clicks. It will allow e-commerce projects to add to their stores new payment method - which is a FutureCoin  Advertising Network, where FutureCoin is an only payment method. It will be launched on 8th of October and will enable advertising and partnering opportunities on social networks. It will allow to host advertising and earn money by partnering.  It will create an additional demand on a FutureCoin.

Author: futurecoin_light
Title: [ANN][ICO] FutureCoin Light 🔥
Body: The ERC20 token standard describes the functions and events that an Ethereum token contract has to implement. The ERC20 standard are fully described here.  A token on Ethereum is basically a balance in an Ethereum contract. A contract could be programmed to issue tokens when it receives its own proof of work: double sha256 is readily available, since the Ethereum Virtual Machine has a precompiled contract for sha256.  You are also could check this example of PoW token.  The tokens are ERC20 and ERC223 compatible and can be traded openly on all compatible exchanges, different algorithms require differing amounts of effort to produce tokens of the same difficulty, the current implementations are: SHA3 (Ethereum) SHA256 Elliptic Curve (secp256k1)

Author: futurecoin_light
Title: [ANN][ICO] FutureCoin Light 🔥
Body: FutureCoin it is a name of our token. I believe that we can provide our users with some innovations, which would lead us to success. As example we are developing great platform for ICO in Ethereum Network, this platform is a part of FutureCoin. We are also developing solutions for e-commerce projects which will allow easily integrate new payment method into any web-store in a few clicks and start to receive payments in FutureCoins. The third product which is in a process - is an advertising network, where FutureCoin is an only payment method.  We are also providing a fair smart-contracts with a 100% refund in case if we don't collect the amount of money necessary for further development.  If you are saying this is pyramid - you are a bit wrong. This is called Multi-Level Marketing (MLM) - is a controversial marketing strategy for the sale of products or services where the revenue of the MLM company is derived from a non-salaried workforce (also called participants, and variously known as "salespeople", "distributors", "consultants", "promoters", "independent business owners", etc.) selling the company's products/services, while the earnings of the participants is derived from a pyramid-shaped commission system.  Classical pyramid do not have actual product - we have. But nowadays market is huge and very competitive, so we should stay on the way somehow...  I will prepare a full presentation of products we will introduce for our users and it will be publicly accessible and also will publish theme here.
